lead_paragraph: GOLDBERG--Marianne L.,died peacefully at her home in Chilmark, MA on December 21 after a sudden and brief illness. She was surrounded by friends. A funeral service will be held on Tuesday, December 29 at 2pm at the Martha's Vineyard Hebrew Center in Vineyard Haven. Burial will follow at the Abel's Hill Cemetery in Chilmark. A celebration of her life will be held at a later date. Donations may be made in her memory to the Pathways Projects Institutes Limited, P.O. Box 437, Chilmark, MA 02535. Services are under the care of the Chapman, Cole and Gleason Funeral Home in Oak Bluffs. For online guest book and information visit: www.ccgfuneralhome.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOLDBERG, MARIANNE L.
